curated_results.title: Metadata API | Next.js
curated_results.snippet: The Metadata API replaces next/head in the app directory. Use metadata export or generateMetadata for SEO optimization.

curated_results.title: Migrating from next/head | Next.js
curated_results.snippet: next/head is deprecated in the app router. Use the new Metadata API instead for managing page metadata and SEO.

curated_results.title: App Router Migration Guide | Next.js
curated_results.snippet: Complete guide for migrating from pages to app router including head tag replacement with metadata API.
